import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import '../Navbar.css'; import {Typography} from '@material-ui/core'; import '../App.css'; import Grid from '../Grid' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import profile_pic from '.././pictures/profile_pic.jpeg' import Square from '.././pictures/Square-circle.png' import Waterloo from '.././pictures/Waterloo-round.png' import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' // import LightMode from './LightMode' import styles from '.././styles.js'; function Header() { const classes = styles(); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (
